# didUpdate(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the observer that the specified items have been updated.

## Declaration

```swift
func didUpdate(_ updatedItems: [any NSFileProviderItemProtocol])
```

## Parameters

- **updatedItems**: An array of updated items.

## Observing Changes

- **didDeleteItems(withIdentifiers:)**: Tells the observer that the specified items have been deleted.
- **finishEnumeratingChanges(upTo:moreComing:)**: Tells the observer that all of the changes have been enumerated up to the specified sync anchor.
- **finishEnumeratingWithError(_:)**: Tells the observer that an error occurred during change notification.
- **suggestedBatchSize**: The batch size that the system recommends.
